## Installation {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
require(stelfi)
```


**Option 1**: `stelfi` is on CRAN

```{r}
#| eval: false
install.packages("stelfi")
```

**Option 2**: the development version of `stelfi` package can be installed from GitHub

```{r}
#| eval: false
devtools::install_github("cmjt/stelfi")
```



::: {.callout-note}

```{r}
citation("stelfi")
```
:::
